TopicTitle: [1.12.X] Tantares - Stockalike Soyuz and MIR [16.1][28.05.2024][{Proton Revamp]

Articles.Content: Happy Launches!

15 hours ago, Beale said:

Beautiful! How did you get the fairings so smooth?

Simple  It's actually two fairings - one clipped into the TKS' rear command pod (I can't recall the source right now, but, as I read, its outer ring actually was the ship's fairing base) and the other acting as an interstage. The docking port is, naturally, attached to the FB and clipped outwards. Here's what the whole setup (minus the rocket) looks like:

   

BTW, the same clip-in technique was used for LOK's interstage, if anyone's curious.

And while I'm still here, I have a bug to report: the Soyuz fairing (T-APS) fails to jetisson, but the model becomes transparent for the ship (it passes through when separated). Can you do something about it?

Edited December 17, 2017 by TK-313
@Beale I think I have made a pull request, but it's by first time doing something other than downloading a branch on github so I may have done something wrong

@Deltac@Drakenex I'm loving the new color schemes for Tantares. I have two requests, however. Could a set of recolors be done for the Soyuz docking ports? Also, I noticed there is no green version of the Older Service Module. Was that intended? You guys have done a phenomenal job, keep it up.

1 hour ago, Chimer4 said:

@Beale I think I have made a pull request, but it's by first time doing something other than downloading a branch on github so I may have done something wrong

Thanks! Yes that looks perfect, I will integrate it when I have a moment.

 

Hopefully this will be a short fun project, well I am already having a lot of fun. The Fobos probe! Precursor to both the Fregat and Fobos Grunt.
It was generally a failure in reality, but Phobos 2 retrieved valuable Mars science, even if it failed the primary objective.

  Currently there are 7 unique parts in here, a lot more to come.

2 hours ago, Beale said:

Re: the T-APS, erm I cannot reproduce this, do you have any pictures to help?

Be my guest.

Spoiler

Here is a Soyuz taking off. As you can see on the left, we're going to stage the LES and the fairing at the same time. Staging...

Here goes nothing!

But the fairing became ship-transparent.

Now let's try fairing first...

It works!

And the LES first...

Mind the staging sequence again: the fairing isn't staged yet, but is already marked as spent and will behave as in case 1.

All in all, this is some weird fairing behavior, IMO.

Edited December 17, 2017 by TK-313
Looking good! @Beale, Any chance of getting flags back on the various parts that used to have them?

1 hour ago, TK-313 said:

Green TKS! Yay!

Be my guest.

All in all, this is some weird fairing behavior, IMO.

I've seen that before, but I don't think it's a problem with tantares as I've seen it with other fairings. In my own experiences, it happens if you stage the fairing at the same time you decouple the thing that it's attached to.

Seems to be a bug present in stock, just tested it in my test install (no other mods) and I can replicate it.

Edited December 17, 2017 by Chimer4
testing
